snippet: David D. Kirkpatrick, The Times’s Cairo Bureau Chief, answered questions on Twitter about the crisis in Egypt and the possible release of former President Hosni Mubarak.
lead_paragraph: David D. Kirkpatrick, The Times’s Cairo Bureau Chief, answered questions on Twitter about the crisis in Egypt and the possible release of former President Hosni Mubarak.

headline.main: Twitter Chat With The Times’s Cairo Bureau Chief
